parameters.name: DatabaseIds
parameters.description: The IDs of the databases that you want to remove.

parameters.name: HostGroupId
parameters.description:
The ID of the asset group from which you want to remove databases.

> You can call the [ListHostGroups](~~201307~~) operation to query the asset group ID.

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description:
The ID of the bastion host whose asset group you want to manage.

> You can call the [DescribeInstances](~~153281~~) operation to query the bastion host ID.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description:
The region ID of the bastion host whose asset group you want to manage.

> For more information about the mapping between region IDs and region names, see [Regions and zones](~~40654~~).
